content.objective: Driven computer science student with a curiosity and passion for learning, looking for opportunities to gain more technical skills and expand knowledge.
skills: Proficient in C#, Java, and C++
Familiar with Git and its functions
Experienced in Unity 2D and 3D, including online multiplayer
Experience in publishing apps on the iOS App Store
Quick to adapt, with several years of experience. Picking up new programming languages comes easily as the only new learning required is syntax

education.qualification: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

details: Sole developer for 5 iOS apps, developed in Unity, with over 400 downloads combined.

details.Ball Sorting In Tubes: A 2D puzzle game with advertising revenue.
details.Tank Battles – Online: A 3D shooter with multiplayer, implemented using Photon and Playfab.
details.Inbetween Worlds and Chicken Daydreams: 2D infinite runners with pixel art styles, monetized with ads.
details.Everything Calendar: A comprehensive calendar app combining multiple organizational tools.

details: Tasks included unloading/loading orders, setting up large canopies, and cleaning the shop.
Required physical labor and client interaction.
